title: Sales Associate - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: Vienna, W 1010
body:
Unsere Recruitingprojekte laufen weiter. Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Bewerbung und die Aktualisierungen Ihrer Angaben im ISG-Karriereportal!

Wir sind uneingeschränkt im Home-Office verfügbar.

Our client is an international high end brand for menswear, bringing the finest garments in the world to Vienna by opening a flag store in the Vienna City Center at the Golden Quartier. We are looking for a Sales Assistant with experience, to support the brand by attracting the right clients to the shop. The exclusive brand is produces collections for over 50 years and is legendary.

Sales Associate

Flag Store - high end brand

Ref Nr. 76568

Job Responsibilities:

  • Grows and maintains databases.
  • Updates managers by consolidating, analyzing, and forwarding daily action summaries.
  • Resolves order and inventory problems by investigating data and history; identifying alternate means for filling orders; and notifying managers and customers.
  • Provides sales vs. projection results by preparing and forwarding sales tracking reports.
  • Dealing with requests, arranging shipments, and notifying customers.
  • Maintains customer databases by inputting customer profiles and updates; preparing and distributing monthly reports.
  • Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities.
  • Accomplishes department and organization mission.
This is a fulltime position, working according rules in Austria. The company pays a salary and a bonus. The company provides a uniform for employees.

Qualifications/Skills:

  • Written and verbal communication skills in German and English is must, Russian, Chinese, Arabic are assets
  • Customer service and people skills
  • Merchandise skills, knowledge of materials
  • Selling skills
  • Critical thinking
  • Organizational skills
  • Computer data entry skills

Education and Experience Requirements:

  • High school diploma
  • College degree preferred
  • 0-3 years’ experience in sales of luxary brands
  • On-the-job training provided
